charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came to the village 
to do a sprint workout.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1101_020: While there, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw somebody unexpected.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_030:
Yo! If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Workin’ hard, or hardly workin’?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_070:
Ha ha ha!
I like your honesty, kid!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_080:
You’re going around, seeing the sights on
your own, right?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_090:
It’s best to see, hear, and experience things
for yourself! Especially if it’s somewhere new!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_100:
You could get the information from a book that
you can read in the safety of your room, sure.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_110:
But you wouldn’t experience anything that way.
It’s the experience that becomes real knowledge.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_120: You can’t say you’ve studied until you do that.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0401_140: You look like you don’t exactly believe me.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0302_150: That sounds like a lot of work.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_160:
You got that right!
It’s always easier said than done.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_170:
All right, here’s a special treat.
I’ll tell you how I met my Pinsir!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_180: Clean those ears out and listen up!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_190:
It happened a while back, when I was searching
for Berries in the forest for my research.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_200:
I came across a Berry I had never seen before.
That’s when this guy showed up in front of me.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_210: I’m guessing he wanted to eat the Berry!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_220:
Well, from there, it was a conversation between
my fists and his horns.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_230:
But here’s the thing. See these horns?
They’re hard as anything! 
We weren’t getting anywhere!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_240: So we entered a war of attrition.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_250:
See, I knew that Pinsir can’t move 
as quickly on cold nights.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_260:
And just as I planned, 
Pinsir finally forfeited to me!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_270: And ever since then, we’ve been best buddies!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0401_290:
Nah, just a day in the life of a guy who can let 
himself stay curious.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0302_300: I’m surprised you got out of that OK.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_310:
Well, you can’t move forward if you’re afraid,
ya know?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_320:
I want to test what I know, and I want to
know what I don’t already know.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_330:
But in order to do so, I have to be
physically strong.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_340:
So what do you think?
You feel like you got stronger already, don’t ya?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0301_350: Uh, I’m not sure about that.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0401_360:
Come on! You’re wasting your life away with
that kind of attitude!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_390:
Earnest people get strong!
They can absorb a lot more that way!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_400:
Whether you can use my story to make yourself
stronger is all up to you.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_410:
But don’t just think about it, because that’s not
enough. You have to experience it yourself, too.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_420:
If there’s something you want to do, try it.
It doesn’t matter if you’re nervous about it
or if you’re crummy at it.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_430:
Being able to do that is the most important
quality you can have!
